solution_line_template: James starts with {initial_legos} Legos and uses half of them, leaving {initial_legos}/{half_divisor}=<<{initial_legos}/{half_divisor}={unused_legos}>>{unused_legos} Legos unused.
He puts those unused Legos away but since he's missing {missing_pieces} he only puts {unused_legos}-{missing_pieces}=<<{unused_legos}-{missing_pieces}={legos_in_box}>>{legos_in_box} Legos away.
